title: This Dividend Achiever Offers High Yield and Growth
text:
Investors typically purchase real estate investment trusts, otherwise known as REITs, for incomeIndeed, REITs routinely pay high dividend yields, well above the average yield of the S&P 500 IndexBut in rare cases, investors can find REITs that not only provide high dividend yields, but also add a bonus of growthW.P. Carey (WPC) is a REIT that has ...

description: The real estate investment trust W.P. Carey is yielding 4.5% and has strong earnings and growth.
